entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog at times overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
